name: Space Pirate Resistance
description:
Space Pirate Resistance is a classic shoot-em-up game in which we place ourselves in the shoes of a young girl who dreams of becoming the greatest pirate captain in the galaxy.

This is just a pre-demo with just one level and a very limited upgrades.

If you like it, you can follow the project to keep actualized about the updates and news.

Thank you to play it!

See you in the incoming updates soon.

---------------

This  demo includes free license music and sound effects and Unreal Engine explosion asset. We are working on it for Pre 0.5 version.
